reference.shortdesc: The parmname element identifies the name of an API parameter.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The parmname is specialized from keyword. It is defined in the programming domain module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and keyref.

example.title: Example
example.p: In the following code sample, the parmname element identifies a parameter used with the config command:
example.codeblock: Use the /env parameter of the config command to update the field value.
